pullRequest.title: Server settings
pullRequest.bodyText:
Work towards #3812. Depends on #3777. I'll move straight onto to a refactor of the ServerPreferencesFragment (mainly migrating it to AndroidX) which I think we should do before closing the issue.
This reworks the Server settings screen to match the designs/flow in the issue.
What has been done to verify that this works as intended?
Expanded existing to tests to cover custom server path funcionality as well as the settings.
Why is this the best possible solution? Were any other approaches considered?
To echo my comment above I think we really should move this settings screen to AndroidX but I'll follow up with that to actually close out the issue.
How does this change affect users? Describe intentional changes to behavior and behavior that could have accidentally been affected by code changes. In other words, what are the regression risks?
Key regression risk would be that server settings aren't applied in someway. Good to check setting and changing server settings (including Google sheets). I'd like to add more test coverage to these screens as part of the upcoming refactor to lower the risk of changes here.
Does this change require updates to documentation? If so, please file an issue here and include the link below.
It probably does right? I'll add an issue. Filed at getodk/docs#1219
Before submitting this PR, please make sure you have:

 run ./gradlew checkAll and confirmed all checks still pass OR confirm CircleCI build passes and run ./gradlew connectedDebugAndroidTest locally.
 verified that any code or assets from external sources are properly credited in comments and/or in the about file.
 verified that any new UI elements use theme colors. UI Components Style guidelines

nodes.bodyText: Even though this is now a feature test, I think keeping the link to @getodk/testers' internal numbering (NODK-235) would be good so we can identify where those cases are being addressed. @getodk/testers?
Might be good to have coverage for this admin mode behavior or at least flag it for QA.

Maybe "legacy" doesn't add anything and we should use "Custom server paths" everywhere. The detail text about removal is clear enough, I think. I had proposed that wording but now that I've looked at translations for the .settings feature that also uses "legacy", I think it can be hard to translate to other languages.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -743,4 +743,5 @@
     <string name="preference_not_available">Not available</string>
     <string name="legacy_custom_server_paths">Legacy custom server paths</string>
     <string name="custom_server_paths">Custom server paths</string>

nodes.bodyText: I don't think people know what "OpenRosa" is. Could we say "Please use /formList and /submission on your server"?
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -743,4 +743,5 @@
     <string name="preference_not_available">Not available</string>
     <string name="legacy_custom_server_paths">Legacy custom server paths</string>
     <string name="custom_server_paths">Custom server paths</string>
+    <string name="legacy_custom_server_paths_summary">Will be removed in a future version. Please use standard Open Rosa paths on your server.</string>

nodes.bodyText: I think this can now be untranslated? Or at least the resource name should change to server_platform_odk or server_platform_default.

-    <string name="server_platform_odk_aggregate">ODK Aggregate</string>
+    <string name="server_platform_odk_aggregate">ODK</string>

commit.message: Rewrite custom server paths test to use stubbed open rosa server
Inline unused super class for server preferences
Move custom server paths to their own screen
Revise layouts for server preferences
Change server type string
Remove unused strings
Remove unused strings
Revise wording
Move ODK string to untranslated
Use correct server type in tests

afterCommit.message: Use correct server type in tests

commit.message: Fix preferences crash when rotating screen
Pull out and test protocol mapping logic
Add migration fro other server type
Add regression tests tags to tests

nodes.bodyText: This and ValueTranslator feel somewhat disjoint from the migration tools in org.odk.collect.android.preferences. It would be good to consolidate them in your follow-up.

commit.message: Correct server type dialog title
Merge branch 'master' into server-settings
Merge remote-tracking branch 'opendatakit/master' into server-settings
Correct test rule name
Don't allow multiclick on custom server paths button
Stop server paths from being reset to default when loaded
